_json.summary:
I am a freshly incepted graduate from the Full-Stack JavaScript Web Development Bootcamp at RefactorU in beautiful Boulder Colorado. I am passionate about software and web development and energized by collaborating with people in solving problems. I find myself equally enthusiastic about both client-side / front-end development, and back-end development processes and enjoy working across the stack. I consider myself a life-long student, and always love diving into new projects and learning new things. I'm excited to be joining a field of so many talented software engineers working to improve people's lives through better software development! 

When I'm not coding, I keep busy as a musician, photographer, explorer of Colorado, and father of two amazing children.
_json.headline: Full Stack Developer
